author: Sandra Hurley
title: What you need to know about new Covid-19 restrictions
description: As the Government announces new Covid-19 restrictions, RTÉ Political Reporter Sandra Hurley outlines the changes.
content:
The Government is now asking people to stay at home if possible.
Here are the details:
What's New?
All non-essential retail to close. 
Supermarkets and pharmacies will remain open.
Restaurants and cafes can operate only for takeaway and delivery.
